name: AdV 1.0.1
description:
I work on this game in my free time, so don't expect much updates to it.

You may report bugs or suggestions to codinglitchdev@gmail.com or by posting a comment. I will check in on comments every now and then.

This game is a unique text-based fantasy RPG. Currently the game is still early access, meaning that you may find bugs, and that the game may be unbalanced. Even so, I hope you will enjoy it.
